languages.text: "Пестрые краски отвергли ее, осталась... лишь серо-зеленая нить. Удавка, что еретичка затянула на собственной шее. Я видела подобное множество раз. От страха... никому не сбежать".
"The motley hues have rejected her, leaving... only a greyish-green thread — the noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many times before. No one can escape fear itself."
languages.original_text: "Пестрые краски отвергли ее, осталась... лишь серо-зеленая нить. Удавка, что еретичка затянула на собственной шее. Я видела подобное множество раз. От страха... никому не сбежать".

traits.locale_text: "The mottled hues have rejected her, leaving... only a thread of greyish-green. The noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many a time before. No one can escape from their own fear."

"The mottled hues have rejected her, leaving... only a thread of greyish-green. The noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many a time before. No one can escape from their own fear."
"The mottled hues have rejected her, leaving... only a greyish-green thread. The noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many times before. No one can escape fear itself."
"The mottled hues have rejected her, leaving... only a greyish-green thread. The noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many times before. No one can escape fear itself."
"The motley hues have rejected her, leaving... only a greyish-green thread — the noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many times before. No one can escape fear itself."
"The motley hues have rejected her, leaving... only a greyish-green thread — the noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many times before. No one can escape fear itself."

languages.text: "Die melierten Farbtöne haben sie abgewiesen, und übrig .. ist nur ein graugrüner Faden. Der Strick, den die Ketzerin sich selbst um den Hals gelegt hat. Ich habe dergleichen schon oft gesehen. Niemand entkommt der Angst an sich."
languages.original_text: "The motley hues have rejected her, leaving... only a greyish-green thread — the noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many times before. No one can escape fear itself."

traits.locale_text: "Die melierten Farbtöne haben sie abgewiesen, und übrig .. ist nur ein graugrüner Faden. Der Strick, den die Ketzerin sich selbst um den Hals gelegt hat. Ich habe dergleichen schon oft gesehen. Niemand entkommt der Angst an sich."

languages.text: « Les teintes bigarrées l'ont rejetée, ne laissant... qu'un fil gris-vert. La corde que l'hérétique a passée autour de son propre cou. J'ai déjà vu cela à de nombreuses reprises. Personne n'échappe à la peur. »
languages.original_text: "The motley hues have rejected her, leaving... only a greyish-green thread — the noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many times before. No one can escape fear itself."

traits.locale_text: « Les teintes bigarrées l'ont rejetée, ne laissant... qu'un fil gris-vert. La corde que l'hérétique a passée autour de son propre cou. J'ai déjà vu cela à de nombreuses reprises. Personne n'échappe à la peur. »

languages.text: “斑驳的色调已经拒绝了她，只留下一条……灰绿色的丝线，是那个异端分子套在自己脖子上的绞索。这种情况我曾见过无数次，没人可以从恐惧中逃脱。”
languages.original_text: "The motley hues have rejected her, leaving... only a greyish-green thread — the noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many times before. No one can escape fear itself."

traits.locale_text: “斑驳的色调已经拒绝了她，只留下一条……灰绿色的丝线，是那个异端分子套在自己脖子上的绞索。这种情况我已经见过无数次了，没人可以从恐惧中逃脱。”

languages.text: 「まだらの色調が彼女を拒み、灰色がかった緑色の糸だけが残されました。異端者が自分の首に巻いた締め縄です。こういうことは何度も見てきました。恐怖それ自体から逃れられるものは誰もおりません」
languages.original_text: "The motley hues have rejected her, leaving... only a greyish-green thread — the noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many times before. No one can escape fear itself."

traits.locale_text: 「まだらの色調が彼女を拒み、灰色がかった緑色の糸だけが残されました。異端者が自分の首に巻いた締め縄です。こういうことは何度も見てきました。恐怖それ自体から逃れられるものは誰もおりません」

languages.text: «Los tonos variopintos la han abandonado, dejando solo un hilo verde grisáceo... El lazo que la hereje ha atado a su propio cuello. He presenciado esto más veces. Nadie puede escapar al miedo».
languages.original_text: "The motley hues have rejected her, leaving... only a greyish-green thread — the noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many times before. No one can escape fear itself."

traits.locale_text: «Los tonos moteados la han abandonado, dejando solo un hilo verde grisáceo... El lazo que la hereje ha atado a su propio cuello. He presenciado esto más veces. Nadie puede escapar al miedo».

languages.text: "Alacalı renkler onu reddetti. Ardında... Grimsi yeşil bir iplik kaldı. Kâfirin kendi boynuna geçirdiği ilmek bu. Böylelerini daha önce de görmüştüm. Kimse, korkunun kendisinden kaçamaz."
languages.original_text: "The motley hues have rejected her, leaving... only a greyish-green thread — the noose that the heretic put around her own neck. I have seen this many times before. No one can escape fear itself."

traits.locale_text: "Alacalı renkler onu reddetti. Ardında... Gri yeşilimsi bir iplik kaldı. Kâfirin kendi boynuna geçirdiği ilmek... Böylelerini daha önce de görmüştüm. Kimse, korkunun kendisinden kaçamaz."
